abstract: As Washington officials react with almost contented silence to a weak dollar, European officials are grumbling because it makes American exports cheaper in world markets.
snippet: As Washington officials react with almost contented silence to a weak dollar, European officials are grumbling because it makes American exports cheaper in world markets.
lead_paragraph: The dollar is near record lows against the euro and has weakened considerably against several other major currencies, but officials in Washington are reacting with almost contented silence.

headline.main: U.S. Affects a Strong Silence on Its Weak Currency
headline.print_headline: U.S. Affects a Strong Silence on Its Weak Currency
